sql.name: queryXhHouseLoanConsultList
sql.sqlString: select a.CUSTOMER_NAME,/*客户姓名*/ a.CUSTOMER_SEX,/*性别*/ a.IDENTIFICATION_CARD,/*身份证号码*/ a.CUSTOMER_SOURCE,/*客户来源*/ a.MARRITAL,/*婚否*/ a.CUSTOMER_TEL,/*电话*/ a.NOW_ADDRESS,/*现住址*/ a.HOUSE_TYPE,/*房产性质*/ a.HOUSE_LIMIT,/*使用年限*/ a.HOUSE_REGION,/*所属区县*/ a.HOUSE_AREA,/*房产面积*/ a.HOUSE_YEARS,/*建成年代*/ a.HOUSE_FLOOR,/*房屋楼层*/ a.HOUSE_ADDRESS,/*房屋地址*/ a.HOUSE_INFO,/*房产详 细情况*/ a.ALL_LOAN_RATE,/*综合利率*/ a.LOAN_AMOUNT,/*贷款额度*/ a.LOAN_MONTH,/*贷款周期*/ a.ASSESS_PRICE,/*评估价格*/ a.LOAN_USE,/*贷款用途*/ a.BACK_SOURCE,/*还款来源*/ a.CUSTOMER_REQUIRED,/*客户要求*/ a.REMARK,/*备注*/ a.CUSTOMRER_MANAGER_ID,/*客户经理*/ a.TEAM_MANAGER_ID,/*团队经理*/ a.LODGE_QUERY_ID,/*涉诉查询*/ a.ORGAN_ID,/*组织机构*/ a.ID from XH_HOUSE_LOAN_CONSULT a where 1=1 $sql
